name: Flamethrower
description: Close range tower with good pierce and a burn effect which persists after enemies leave the tower's radius

name: More volatile fuel
description: More direct damage, much more burn damage, and longer lasting burn

name: Yellow fire
description: More pierce, damage, burn damage, and burn lasts much longer

name: Green fire
description: Chemical burn (can be combined with freeze), more damage

name: Black fire
description: Replaces with the doom effect: major percent damage over time, slower speed, and multiplied damage from all attacks, permanently

name: Faster fuel
description: Increased pierce, damage, and turn speed

name: Larger flames
description: Increased pierce, damage, turn speed, and projectile size

name: Circle of fire
description: Shoots flames around the entire tower (TODO)

name: Inferno
description: Massive damage, and makes enemies in radius slower and more vulnerable
